message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product, which I know you've been interested in, at a special price. I believe it's worth at least $1,000,000 to you, and I'm confident you'll find it extremely valuable.  I'm willing to let it go for $1,000,000. This is a one-time offer, and I know it won't last long. Let me know if you're interested.
